action: Update a string variable in Apilio
action_description: This action will update a string variable in Apilio

action: Do a mathematical operation with a numeric variable
action_description: Add or subtract a value from a numeric variable in Apilio.

action: Update a numeric variable in Apilio
action_description: This action will update a numeric variable in Apilio.

action: Initiate a logicblock evaluation in Apilio
action_description: This action will initiate the evaluation of the specified logicblock in Apilio.

action: Update a variable in Apilio to false
action_description: This action will update a boolean variable in Apilio to false.

action: Clear a string variable in Apilio
action_description: This action will clear a string variable in Apilio.

action: Toggle a boolean variable on Apilio
action_description: This action will update a boolean variable in Apilio from true to false or from false to true.

action: Update a variable in Apilio to true
action_description: This action will update a boolean variable in Apilio to true.
